```{r}
data <- read.csv("~/Dropbox/bimm143_rproj/class08/UK_foods.csv")
dim(data)
head(data)
```

Set rownames
```{r}
rownames(data) <- data[,1]

data <- data[, -1]

head(data)
```

Use knitr to make a nice table of the data

```{r}
library(knitr)

knitr::kable(data, caption = "The full UK foods data table")
```
